paragraph.heading: 1 Precompile Project Wizard
paragraph.paragraph: The Precompile Project Wizard create a new precompiled project that may be used as a precompiled library from other projects.
paragraph.heading: 2Page content
paragraph.paragraph: The wizard comprises of the following pages:

list.item: Precompile Options - Setting to modify what is generated in your precompiled project

paragraph.heading: 2Precompile Settings
paragraph.paragraph: By default the precompile project wizard will create a new precompile project using the existing Eiffel Base Class (eBCL) precompile library. You may turn this option off by un-checking the 'Use eBCL precompile?' option. If eBCL is not used then you may select the Eiffel libraries you would like to include in your procompile project via the 'Include Library' list.
